attributes.action: Make bus fares less expensive for students.
attributes.additional_details: I want bus fares to be less expensive for students because I don’t want parents to need to make different money plans so they can afford for their children to get to school and back.
attributes.background: Give funds to parents for bus fares so they don’t need to pay 800 pound each year to get there children to school.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund free school transport for all under 18s: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617780

Fund free public transport for children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616644
